RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 7F Turf CR: 82. Allowance Purse 18800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 5 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Co nsidered In Eligibility). (If necessary will be run SIX FURLONGS Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FOOL FOR THE CITY sent to the front was saved on soft splits to the far turn carrying the duel to upper stretch digging deep late abreast foe to get up at the wire. KANAAN tracked evenly while saving ground drawing even in upper stretch dueling gamely to the wire. AGADOR SPARTACUS tracked evenly rallying to loom boldly three deep in upper stretch hanging the final sixteenth. JACKSON MAN slow early circled out to upper stretch bidding late six wide. TIMBERRY TIDDLER raced evenly to upper stretch lacking surge there. EXECUTIVE PRIZE racing inside played no factor. QUANTUM THEORY moved on pace through the far turn weakening into upper stretch. ROSE'S PEPINO failed to respond. PRETTY LOUD was never involved.

ENTRY.NAME: Executive Prize
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Rose's Pepino
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Jackson Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, circled out to lane, late bid 6 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Agador Spartacus
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked evenly, loomed three deep lane, no excuse,

ENTRY.NAME: Kanaan
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked evenly, saved ground to lane, dueled inside, gave all

ENTRY.NAME: Quantum Theory
ENTRY.OWNER: Bernardini Jay P and Burnsworth Richard
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved on pace, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Fool for the City
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent, saved on pace, abreast lane, got up gamely,

ENTRY.NAME: Timberry Tiddler
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, lacked more

ENTRY.NAME: Pretty Loud
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 7F Turf CR: 80. Allowance Purse 21200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 5 Allowed 3 lbs. (Maiden Or Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allo wances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility). (If necessary will be run SIX FURLONGS Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TOUT ENSEMBLE a step slow early lost ground to upper stretch finding a sudden late burst in the six path to arrive in time. BLUE NEITH broke outward calmly advancing to a tracking position moving up on the far turn bidding to a late lead three deep being grabbed from the outside in the last strides. CURIOSITY KILLS carried out at the break was hustled to the front moving abreast rival to upper stretch dueling there staying on to the end. VINTAGE SPARKLE raced evenly to the far turn giving a mild rally into upper stretch threatening late in the four path. SHES SO SPEIGHTSY sent to the front set a pressured pace dueling through the far turn into upper stretch being outfinished along the inside. LILLY CHROME slow early swung out seven wide for the stretch run. GOLD PASS faded to the far turn. OFFTHEROADAGAIN was never involved.

ENTRY.NAME: Offtheroadagain
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Vintage Sparkle
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, mild rally to lane, threatened late 4 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Shes So Speightsy
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent, moved on pace dueled to lane, outfinished inside

ENTRY.NAME: Lilly Chrome
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, swung out 7 wide lane

ENTRY.NAME: Gold Pass
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded to the far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Tout Ensemble
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, lost ground to lane, sudden late burst 6 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Blue Neith
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, tracked evenly, moved to lane, led late, grabbed

ENTRY.NAME: Curiosity Kills
ENTRY.COMMENT: carried out, hustled to top, pressed to lane, stayed on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 5F Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 7800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 5 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OFFUTT COLE pressed the pace wresting a short lead on the turn shaking clear in upper stretch holding under heavy outside pressure late. SOUTHERN SENSE slow early dropped back being hard ridden while five wide on the turn emerging in upper stretch running at the leader late to no avail. IMISSBAYMEADOWS slow early saved ground to upper stretch finishing evenly on the inside. HOLLYWOOD PRINCE sent hard pressured through the turn ceding in upper stretch weakening late. ELUSIVE MOTION chased the early pace then faded in upper stretch. FULL OF LIFE was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Hollywood Prince
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent hard, pressed pace, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Imissbaymeadows
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, saved ground, finished evenly inside

ENTRY.NAME: Offutt Cole
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, short lead turn, shook clear lane, held up

ENTRY.NAME: Southern Sense
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, wide rush on turn, loomed lane, held off late

ENTRY.NAME: Elusive Motion
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Full of Life
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 5F Dirt CR: 62. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KETO FRIENDLY stalked the pace surging along the inside to take the lead at the quarter pole clearing in upper stretch drawing out as much the best. EVENING BIRD sent clear was hooked on the turn being overpowered into upper stretch keeping after it there to salvage place. ONE MORE NIGHT hesitated then was bumped at the break, hurried after raced wide through the turn responding down the lane to finish well. MY SUNSHINE POWER chased the pace through the turn finishing evenly along the rail. DON'T LOOK UP was bumped and in tight at the break. SECRET SEDUCTION came out causing traffic at the break. HIGHWAY ROBBERY was always outrun. PER RULING #100 FROM THE WEST VIRGINIA RACING COMMISSION, KETO FRIENDLY WAS DISQUALIFIED FROM 1st TO UNPLACED DUE TO A POSITIVE TEST.

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Keto Friendly
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, surged inside turn, clear to lane, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Secret Seduction
ENTRY.COMMENT: came out causing traffic at the break

ENTRY.NAME: Don't Look Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped in tight break

ENTRY.NAME: One More Night
ENTRY.COMMENT: hesitated bumped break, wide turn, finished well

ENTRY.NAME: Highway Robbery
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun

ENTRY.NAME: My Sunshine Power
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, inside to lane, finished evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Evening Bird
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, hooked on turn, no match lane, held place

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Gainesway Thoroughbreds LTD & MarylouWhitney Stables LLC

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 5F Dirt CR: 70. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LONE LEADER hustled up on the inside was pressed to the quarter pole shaking off rivals in upper stretch adding on late. DENNIS'S PRIDE away alertly pressed in bid to the quarter pole being rebuffed by the winner in upper stretch continuing on willingly in the four path to save place. GREAT GOOGLYMOOGLY a step slow through the turn angled four wide in mid stretch moving up late. F F READY OR NOT slow early passed a few down the lane. HOPPERNESS hustled along the inside proved no menace. JOHN'S KID pressed with speed to the quarter pole then faded at mid track down the stretch. VASY SAYS NYET chased through the turn tiring in upper stretch. ANGELA'S ANGEL was always outrun.

ENTRY.OWNER: Pesaturo Gus and Joy Kevin J
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow through turn, angled 4 wide lane, moved up

ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled up inside, shook off foes to lane, drew away

ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 5F Dirt CR: 84. Starter Allowance Purse 14200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $4,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 5 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estim ating Allowances) (Preference To Highest Earnings In 2022-2023).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AWESOME MINER broke sharply being pressed through the turn into upper stretch responding inside of rival there proving best in the end. BROTHER SKYE hustled out pressured into the turn extending abreast rival into upper stretch gradually proving second best late. JOSHY JAK angled to the rail was rushed to keep close early checking when in a bit tight at the seven sixteenths pole regrouping some on the turn before weakening in upper stretch. LOST IN MANHATTAN slow early raced five wide down the lane finishing evenly. QUESTION AUTHORITY was never involved. THE FILTER faded on the turn.

ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, pressed into turn, dueled to lane, proved best

ENTRY.COMMENT: angled rail, rushed, checked 7/16 pole

ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, 5 wide into lane, no menace

Non-winners Of A Race Since May 5 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LATER DAYS away alertly pressed the pace from the outset dueling inside of rival through the turn then down the stretch gutting it out at the end. AWESOME APEAL sent hard pressed the pace dueling abreast rival through the turn then down the stretch matching strides to the end. WAY TO FIRE raced evenly through the turn then rallied down the lane finishing well. CASTLE REVIEW hustled off loose leaders would finish evenly. HIGH HEAVEN played no factor. BLACK BUTTE was always outrun. WHISKEY TALKING showed little.

Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 5 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).

ALFIE SOLOMONS away alertly set the pace through the turn being hooked in upper stretch proving no match late. SEMINOLE JUSTICE pressed early then chased to upper stretch finishing evenly to best the others. HONOR LIFE hustled along vied on the turn then weakened in upper stretch.
